Key Match Events: The Suns played a flawless possession to close out the game
Jimmy Butler passed the ball in to Terry Rozier, who was immediately double-teamed by Royce O'Neale and Devin Booker
Herro began his shooting motion a second left on the clock but was forced to pivot out into a pass to Tyler Herro due to the air-born defender in front of him
Post-Match Reflections: For the Heat to truly be competitive in the Eastern Conference, Butler and Adebayo must each average more than 20 points
With performances of this magnitude, it should not come as a surprise if coach Erik Spoelstra begins to adjust the rotation
Miscellaneous Highlights: Haywood Highsmith shined in an increased opportunity, recording 19 points, seven rebounds, and two steals on 7 of 8 shooting
Others: Jimmy Herro is evolving into an All-Star caliber player, with consistency in his shot transforming into a strength
